section.title: 显示试图
section.programlisting: select object_name,created,status from user_objects where object_type in ('VIEW')

section.title: PROCEDURE
section.programlisting: select object_name,created,status from user_objects where object_type in ('PROCEDURE')

section.title: FUNCTION
section.programlisting: select object_name,created,status from user_objects where object_type in ('FUNCTION')

section.title: 视图、存储过程、函数
section.para: 查询数据库中的视图、存储过程、函数
section.screen: select object_name,created,status from user_objects where object_type in ('PROCEDURE','FUNCTION','VIEW')

section.title: 查看存储过程源代码
section.screen:
select text from user_source where name = 'ADD_DEPT';
select text from all_source where name = 'ADD_DEPT';
